document.full_text: the national security agency, a u.s. electronic intelligence service, has been involved in the investigation into last year's hacker attack on nasdaq omx group inc, a u.s. enforcement official said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. spy agency also probing nasdaq hackers: source
lines_and_colors: the national security agency, a u.s. electronic intelligence service, has been involved in the investigation into last year's hacker attack on nasdaq omx group inc, a u.s. enforcement official said on wednesday.
